roleset.name: make slow

example.name: retard-v: the one example
example.text: [Skilled ringers]-1 use their wrists *trace*-1 to advance or retard the next swing, so that one bell can swap places with another in the following change.

example.name: retarded-j
example.text: Either they are extremely shameless or extremely mentally retarded .

example.name: retardation-n: Both args
example.text: The general European war, with its retardation of international commerce, directly affected prices abroad.

roleset.note: RETARD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'retard' based on sentences in wsj. Adjectival 'retarded' found in BOLT-7. (from retard.01-v)
arg2 expected to occur particularly with adjectival relations (from retard.01-v)
